Geyser is not a store. It’s a way to bri: Geyser is not a store. It’s a way to bring creative projects to life using Bitcoin. Your donation will support a creative project that has yet to be developed. There’s a risk that, despite a creator’s best efforts, your reward will not be fulfilled, and we urge you to consider this risk prior to backing it. Geyser is not responsible for project claims or reward fulfillment.

Geyser charges a 2% operational fee from: Geyser charges a 2% operational fee from projects using lightning addresses, and no fees from projects that run their own nodes.

Deactivating your project would not allo: Deactivating your project would not allow others to fund your project, but your project will still be visible to everyone else. You will be able to re-activate your project at any time.
Deleting a project will make the project: Deleting a project will make the project unaccessible to you and others. You can delete a project only if it has received no contributions. This is to ensure transparency for those who have contributed towards the project.
By deleting this project you will loose: By deleting this project you will loose all data associated to this project including descriptions, photos, entries, and rewards.

Bitcoin is signal, everything else is no:
Bitcoin is signal, everything else is noise.
          We created Geyser Grants to help broadcast more Bitcoin signal into the world.
          That is, to accelerate the growth of the Bitcoin ecosystem by increasing Bitcoin awareness, enabling Bitcoin culture, and supporting needed development.
          Through these grants we will be supporting Bitcoin educators, developers, entrepreneurs and creatives with the resources they need to bootstrap their initiatives.
          We accept Bitcoin contributions for each individual grant and don't charge any grant operations fees - Geyser charges no fee to node-running projects, 
          and 2% to projects that use a lightning address. For more information see this doc.
Funding educators, creatives and builder: Funding educators, creatives and builders doing Bitcoin-only  projects on Geyser. Funded by bitcoin  sponsors who want to change the world for the better.
The Geyser Grant Round 1 winners have be: The Geyser Grant Round 1 winners have been released.
The board will be responsible for review: The board will be responsible for reviewing and evaluating the applications.
Bitcoin companies and anon individuals t: Bitcoin companies and anon individuals that want to bring hope to the world.
The aim of this grant is to support not-: The aim of this grant is to support not-for-profit efforts and initiatives going towards Bitcoin education. Bitcoin is a tool for individual freedom and self-sovereignty. It is enabling a revolution that will take humanity to the next level by providing financial freedom and accessibility to the world, and a return to a sound financial system. And yet, most people still see it as a tool for gambling, money for criminals, a ponzi scheme, or an ecological nightmare. This is why the work of Bitcoin educators is so important. Much work is still needed to empower people around the world to use Bitcoin as a tool for escaping rampant inflation, financial censorship and banklessness. For more information, see here.

To recognize active users, Geyser issues: To recognize active users, Geyser issues and awards users with Nostr badges, which can more fully recognize their actions.
Nostr stands for &quot;Notes and Other S: Nostr stands for "Notes and Other Stuff Transmitted by Relays". Like HTTP or TCP-IP, Nostr is a protocol; an open standard upon which anyone can build. Nostr itself is not an app or service that you sign up for. Check out <1>nostr.how</1> for more info
Nostr badges are a new event on Nostr th: Nostr badges are a new event on Nostr that allows users to send and receive digital assets with an image, title and description. They are NIP-58 on Nostr
How to redeem my Nostr badge: How to redeem my Nostr badge
You can claim your Geyser badges very ea: You can claim your Geyser badges very easily on your Geyser profile. Login with Nostr, go to profile and click 'claim'.
Where can I see my Geyser badges?: Where can I see my Geyser badges?
You can access your Geyser badges on any: You can access your Geyser badges on any Nostr platform that showcases Nostr badges such as badges.page and Amethist.
Who can edit and update Nostr Badges?: Who can edit and update Nostr Badges?
The issuer of the badges can edit inform: The issuer of the badges can edit information pertaining to the badges, but not revoke the badge at any point. Therefore Geyser can make edits to the badges if this is ever needed
Yes! We intend to create more badges whe: Yes! We intend to create more badges when we feel like there is a particular reason to recognize hard work or important achievements. But don't worry, we will not 'flood the system with badges'.
Hey, I should have that badge!: Hey, I should have that badge!
If you think you should have access to a: If you think you should have access to a badge reach out to us at <1>hello@geyser.fund</1> and we can review your badge privilege!

Geyser is a bitcoin-native crowdfunding: Geyser is a bitcoin-native crowdfunding platform where you can fund project ideas with the support from global communities.
Where great ideas find great communities: Where great ideas find great communities
Some of the most successful projects and: Some of the most successful projects and brands have launched on Geyser
Welcome to the new way of crowdfunding: Welcome to the new way of crowdfunding
The crowdfunding game is changing and we: The crowdfunding game is changing and we're here for it. Learn how we power up creators and reward their funders.
Traditional crowdfunding platforms opera: Traditional crowdfunding platforms operate in only 30 or so countries. Thanks to Bitcoin, Geyser makes crowdfunding accessible to people all around the world.
Let the Sats and rewards flow: Let the Sats and rewards flow
Most project creators on Geyser reach th: Most project creators on Geyser reach their goals by selling merch related to their ideas, or giving perks and Nostr badges as a reward for supporters. Funders are bullish!
Getting your project up and running only: Getting your project up and running only takes a few minutes. And we make it easy for funders too, so they can fund on-chain, lightning, WebLN and LNURL. All funds go straight to your single wallet.
Supercharge your fundraising efforts wit: Supercharge your fundraising efforts with our tools, features and support
Funding a project is easy and doesn't re: Funding a project is easy and doesn't require users to log in or add their credit card information
Funds are exchanged peer-to-peer and go: Funds are exchanged peer-to-peer and go straight into your wallet. Geyser doesn’t custody and cannot freeze funds.
If you run your own node, Geyser is free: If you run your own node, Geyser is free to use. Otherwise, we charge a 2% fee on transactions (5% lower than other crowdfunding platforms out there).
Over 100 projects have earned funds thro: Over 100 projects have earned funds through our grants
Through the use of #tags it’s easy to be: Through the use of #tags it’s easy to be discovered on Geyser’s landing page and activity feed
Keep your supporters up-to-date with Ent: Keep your supporters up-to-date with Entries on Geyser where you can share your progress through text, images, and videos
Send and receive funds from anyone, anyw: Send and receive funds from anyone, anywhere
Sell merch, perks, and rewards related t: Sell merch, perks, and rewards related to your project, giving your funders even more reasons to let the sats flow
Strip away the complexity by receiving b: Strip away the complexity by receiving bitcoin from different sources (on-chain, lightning, WebLN, LNURL) straight to your wallet.
We are a team of mission-driven bitcoine: We are a team of mission-driven bitcoiners that want to empower the online creator ecosystem through bitcoin.
Receive updates about exciting new proje: Receive updates about exciting new projects, product updates and Geyser news.

Geyser is sponsoring 10M Sats to support: Geyser is sponsoring 10M Sats to support bitcoin films, but it’s the community who decides who wins the grant. Vote with your Sats! 1 Sat = 1 vote. Grant funds will be distributed proportionally to the number of votes received while the grant is active.
This grant support video-game developers:
This grant support video-game developers that have integrated or want to integrate bitcoin and lightning in their platforms. The aim is to celebrate and showcase the power of lightning micropayments to the use case of gaming. Yes, Bitcoin makes gaming fun and rewarding!

This is a community-voting grant where the community grant fund distribution by voting. Vote with your Sats! 1 Sat = 1 vote. Grant funds will be distributed proportionally to the number of votes received while the grant is active.

Supporting communities that are providin: Supporting communities that are providing bitcoin education on the ground.
Billions of people live under a financia:
Billions of people live under a financial system that does not serve them. They are plagued by high inflation, bank failures, state seizures, and the threat of Central Bank Digital Currencies.

These are the people that would most benefit from bitcoin, which can act as a shield. These are also those that are least aware of bitcoin.

Bitcoin communities are forming on ‘the edges’ of the world, bringing a message of hope to their people. What started in 2019 with Bitcoin Beach is now becoming a global movement of communities providing knowledge, education and tools to get started in this movement.

This Grant aims to support the growing Bitcoin communities that are being setup all over the world to increase the signal of Bitcoin.
Check out some trending projects this we: Check out some trending projects this week that you can follow in the discovery view!
Our name 'Geyser' was inspired by natura: Our name 'Geyser' was inspired by naturally occurring geysers, which are astounding spectacles. Given enough pressure water can be ejected with force up into the sky defying gravity. In a similar way, given enough community support, important project ideas can take off and bring about change in the world.
